field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the user account.

field.label: Username
field.help: Set the unique username for the user.

field.label: Authentication Protocol
field.help: Choose the correct Authentication protocol. Recommended to avoid MD5.

field.label: Authentication key
field.help: Set the authentication key for the user. Minimum is 8 characters.

field.label: Privacy Protocol
field.help: Choose the correct Privacy protocol. You need to enable the authentication key first. Recommended to avoid DES.

field.label: Privacy Key
field.help: Set the privacy key to secure the connection between client and this host. Minimum is 8 characters.

field.label: Allow Write Access
field.help: This will enable write access in addition to read-only.
